Pre-Game Insights: The Men in Blue enter the match as clear favourites and are expected to secure a straightforward win.
India will aim to break a 13-year jinx and win an ICC title after last winning it in 2011.
Rohit Sharma and Co will be up against a tricky opponent with a reputation for staging upsets in major events.
India will come on the back of a win in their warm-up game against Bangladesh.
Ireland will play their first cricket of the season.
The clash against arch-rivals Pakistan is next for June 9.
Virat Kohli has been in incredible form with 741 runs in IPL 2024 and is expected to continue this form.
Rohit Sharma is known for his aggressive approach and can get India off to a blazing start.
Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav are expected to perform well due to the pitch conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium is two-paced and favors bowlers.
